data.text:
Sunset capital of Canada? They don't call Saskatchewan the "Land of the Living Skies" for nothing. Along with the city, the badlands, and everything in-between, this nightly show is certainly worth a trip to #YXE.

data.text:
Surprise... 😜
All markets 53% OFF! Use promo code: HERETOSTAY and get 53% off base fare on all flights for travel between May 10, 2022 - June 23, 2022.
Offer ends: 11:59pm MT May 5, 2022 or while seats last. Certain conditions apply.
https://t.co/CoZ62nKz4v https://t.co/qPjFRCLsYy
@ron_81 Is there anything else that you would like for me to assist you with?
@ron_81 Please be patient and the supervisor will revert back to you as soon as they can and you will be able to discuss the matter with the supervisor.
@ron_81 Thank you for providing me with such details Roberto. I have noted that you have a scheduled call with a supervisor, that is with regards your reservation.
@ron_81 Please provide me with your name and last name, reservation number, phone number, email address and date of birth, as they appear in the reservation.

@ron_81 Thank you for reaching out to Flair Airlines. My name is Joshua and I will be assisting you. My sincere and deepest apologies for the late response, as we have been receiving a high number of calls, emails, sms and chats.
